trans-unit.source: Represents the data of a property for a selected item and enables editing of this property with type-specific data.
Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> class.

Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> class that serves as a subproperty of the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
For host infrastructure derived classes.
The parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
Stores whether the target property value matches a specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> to apply.
Gets the name of the category in which this property resides.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the name of the category.
Enables the host infrastructure to create a new host-specific <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> instance.
A new <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object.
Gets the description of the encapsulated property.
A string that contains the description.
Gets the display name for the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.
A string that contains the display name.

Declaration of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> event, which occurs when a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> is changed through a call to the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.ApplyFilter*> method.
To be added.
Gets a value that indicates whether a set of standard values is available for this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if a set of standard values is available; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> is custom-made.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property entry is custom-made; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> is read-only.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property entry is read-only; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> matches the filter.

Sets the value to indicate that the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> matches the filter and fires the event handler method for the property change.
The <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> listens to changes made to this property.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the target object matches the filter; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Implementation of a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.IPropertyFilterTarget"></xref> method that determines whether the target display or type name matches the specified string containing the name of a filter.
The <xref:System.String> display or type name of a filter to match against the target object.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the target display or type name matches the specified string; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Raises the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry.FilterApplied"></xref> event.
The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyFilter"></xref> to apply.
Raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> PropertyChanged event.
The EventArgs for this event.

Raises the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> event when the <xref:System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyContainer> hears that the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> has changed.
The name of the property whose value has changed.
Gets the parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> in classes derived from a host infrastructure.
This is used only for subproperties, so its value can be `null`.
A parent <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref>.
Declaration of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged> event, which occurs when a property value changes.
To be added.
Gets the name of the property.
A string that contains the property name.
Gets the type of the property.
A type that contains the type of the property.
Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValue"></xref> object.

Gets the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> that is used for editing the value of this <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyValueEditor"></xref> object that contains the current editor.
Gets a set of possible values supported by this <xref:System.Activities.Design.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry>.
An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> of possible values.
